No idea what happened...but welcome back. :)[/bq]
Fetish thread could be renamed to "complaining about tame heterosexual porn" thread; I know it was mainly a joke, but after the 999999999999th time of someone jokingly complaining about heterosexual porn it's really fucking annoying.

No offense to anyone but I've gotten some serious shit by people cause I may be bisexual but since I'm leaning far more towards women people giving me shit for not being the "right type" of bisexual.  I don't need that shit here of getting complained at every fucking time; it may have been a joke, but it's really fucking annoying getting complained at for the 999999999th time for not talking about sucking cock.
